title: Ignored by desis, small cars are driving Made in India ambitions elsewhere
description: India's car market shift towards SUVs impacts small car and sedan sales, despite being crucial for exports. Maruti Suzuki leads in exports, shipping to diverse destinations. Hyundai's exports include Verna, Aura, and Grand i10Nios. Price hikes and SUV preference lessen small car demand, but industry anticipates a revival by 2026-2027.
